import React from 'react' import { EditIcon, MenuIcon } from '../icons' import { TableCell, TableRow, Button, Input, } from '@windmill/react-ui' export class Transaction extends React.Component { // TODO: Use setters (check non-empty string) and event handlers to update state & push changes to database constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { editView: false } this.onEditButtonClicked = this.onEditButtonClicked.bind(this) } onEditButtonClicked(){ this.setState({ editView: !this.state.editView }) } render() { const editClicked = this.state.editView if (editClicked) { return ( {new Date(this.props.transaction.date).toLocaleDateString()} {this.props.transaction.balance_change} sats {this.props.transaction.fee} sats
) } return ( {new Date(this.props.transaction.date).toLocaleDateString()}

{this.props.transaction.payee}

{this.props.transaction.description}

 {this.props.transaction.category} {this.props.transaction.balance_change} sats {this.props.transaction.fee} sats
) } } // export default Transaction
